label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_029
content:

### Events
- Opened audit exception for 3 managers missing quarterly attestations past SLA; escalated to department heads with deadlines.
- Verified automatic rejection of privileged requests without ticket IDs; captured screenshots and logs as control evidence.
- Ran end-of-month privileged access summary: 0 break-glass uses this week, 139 sudo requests all linked to tickets.
- Reviewed pipeline drop counts; confirmed 172 drops were non-critical debug events excluded by filter policy.

### On Call
- On Call Shift: J. Steiner

- On Call Tickets: 12
- On Call Status: Stable; attestation escalation active and controls evidenced.
